name: Miki The Little Witch
description:
Story

Miki is a little witch with a singular power : she can die... and be fine!
She is resourceful and doesn’t like to waste, even her own corpse.

Lately, dimensional rifts have appear all over her forest.

Help Miki to close the rifts and have fun discovering all the things that can kill you!

Controls

Use ZQSD / WASD to move Miki and use Space to jump.
Use LMB (left mouse button) to grab a corpse.
If you use a second time the LMB, it will throw the corpse.
Use RMB to drop the corpse, if you grabbing a corpse.

Creators

lephilippetheo.com
https://www.linkedin.com/in/alexandre-rousseau-275884115/
https://www.linkedin.com/in/corentin-goosse/

Known bugs

The music is set to 0% when finished or when you leave the first level.
The walls of the final level have some collision issues.
You can only quit the game from the "Menu Screen".
